DOC.brief_summary: Chronic Mechanical Low Back Pain ( CMLBP ) common disable health problem among general population . Multifidus muscle inhibition accompany CMLBP play major role perpetuate pain functional disability . Lumbar stabilisation treadmill exercise establish treatment CMLBP . However , know two technique effective . This study conduct compare effect lumbar stabilisation treadmill walk multifidus activation , pain functional disability individual CMLBP .
DOC.brief_title: Multifidus Activation , Pain Functional Disability Individuals With Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Fifty-three individual ( 23 female 30 male ) CMLBP participate single blind randomise clinical trial . Consecutive participant recruit outpatient Physiotherapy clinic Aminu Kano Teaching Hospital , Kano , Nigeria randomly assign one two exercise group : Lumbar Stabilisation Group ( LSG ; n = 27 ) Treadmill Walk Group ( TWG ; n = 26 ) . However , 50 participant , ( LSG : n = 25 ; TWG : n = 25 ) complete eight week study . Participants LSG lumbar stabilisation exercise use McGill protocol TWG walk exercise treadmill use Bruce protocol . Treatment apply three time weekly eight week . Outcomes assess baseline end eighth week study : Pain Intensity ( PI ) use Visual Analogue scale , Functional Disability ( FD ) use Oswestry Disability Index Questionnaire ; Multifidus Muscle Activation ( MMA ) level use surface electromyography machine . Data analyse use descriptive statistic , pair independent t-tests α0.05 .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Participants diagnose LBP mechanical origin present 3 month . 2 . Participants score least 20 % Modified Oswestry Dis¬ability Index ( ODI ) . 3 . Participants give consent participate study . 4 . Participants comprehend instruction English Hausa 5 . Participants involved form exercise training course study . 1 . Patients history prior surgery lumbosacral spine . 2 . Patients neurological finding indicate radiculopathy . 3 . Patients acute symptom LBP . 4 . Patients evidence systemic disease , carcinoma organ disease . 5 . Patients obesity due reduce fatty infiltration might affect electrical conductivity multifidus muscle . 6 . Patients 18 year age .
